description:
The 2022 FIFA World Cup is the 22nd edition of the World Cup, and is scheduled to be played in Qatar over November 20 - December 18, 2022.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the winning team for the 2022 FIFA World Cup is from South America. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If at any point it can be definitively determined that it will be impossible for a team from South America to move on to win the 2022 FIFA World Cup, this market will immediately resolve to "No". Likewise, if it can at any point be definitively determined that a team from South America will win the 2022 FIFA World Cup, this market will immediately resolve to "Yes".

If no team is declared the winner of the 2022 FIFA World Cup by December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from FIFA (e.g. https://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/tournaments/mens/worldcup/qatar2022/scores-fixtures), including official footage from the World Cup, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

markets.question: Will the 2022 World Cup winner be from South America?
